story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hey, Red! Who do you think’s gonna win?
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Didja just choose them ’cause they’re
Kanto Gym Leaders?
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
They were the first two big obstacles of our
journeys.
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I guess they left a strong impression on you,
huh, Red?
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_1200_10: Attacks like that’ll never knock out my Onix!
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Oh? Looks like you’ve trained your
Pokémon well.
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_1400_10: But you’re no match for me and my Starmie!
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_1600_10: Yeah. They were strong all right.
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_1700_10:
We’ve gotten stronger since then, and that’s
why we know...
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Brock and Onix, as well as Misty and
Starmie... Their bonds and strength are
the real deal.
story_arceus_08_06000/2401_1001_2000_10:
They’re also Kanto Trainers like us, so let’s
show them our support!
